title.narrative: Pathway 2 Young Women Leadership in South Sudan

description.narrative: Pathway 2 of the YW4A programme has the objective of enhancing the leadership of 17,540 young women (YW) to effectively engage in collective action and decision-making in public, private, and civic spaces in Palestine, Egypt, Kenya, and South Sudan by 2025.

participating-org.narrative: Young Women's Christian Assocation South Sudan

title.narrative: # young women, with 60 % from marginalized communities, assuming leadership roles in public and civic decision-making at community level (disaggregated by cohort)

description.narrative: This indicator refers to the number of young women in the cohort of young women who are trained in the ToT and who experience changes in leadership skills, experiences and practices. A Young Woman Leadership Score was created which is an individualised aggregated measure of leadership. This score represents the baseline value for IO2a. It includes the following categories, arranged from the highest to the lowest: A. Very Skilful, B. Skilful, C. Strongly Emerging, D. Emerging, E. Limited and F. Basic.

reference.code: WRGE indicator 5.2.2: # of individuals with strengthened capacity (knowledge and skills) to advance women’s rights and gender equality

title.narrative: # young women, with 60 % from marginalised communities, assuming leadership roles in public and civic decision-making at community level (disaggregated by cohort).- Experienced

description.narrative: "A Young Woman Leadership Score was created which is an individualised aggregated measure of leadership capacity. The scale includes the following categories, arranged from the highest to the lowest: A. Very Skilful, B. Skilful, C. Strongly Emerging, D. Emerging, E. Limited and F. Basic. These categories are grouped under three large classifications as the following: Experienced including categories A and B; denoting high levels of acquiring the conditions for and the exercise of leadership; Aspiring including categories C and D; referring to young women who have potential for assuming leadership roles and; Starting including categories E and F; which includes young women who are in the early stages of their leadership journey. This indicator shows the measure of Experienced

reference.code: WRGE indicator 5.2.2: dissagregated to female Youth WRG049y

This indicator shows the measure of Starting
